ಮೋಡ ಹಾಕಿಕೊಳ್ಳು mōḍa hākikoḷḷu = ಮೋಡ ಕವಿ - 1; ಮೋಡ ಹಾಕು mōḍa hāku = ಮೋಡ ಕವಿ - 1; ಮೋಡ ಮುಚ್ಚಿಕೊಳ್ಳು mōḍa muccikoḷḷu = ಮೋಡ ಕವಿ - 1; ಮೋಡ ಗುಬರು ಹಾಕಿಕೊಳ್ಳು mōḍa gubaru hākikoḷḷu = ಮೋಡ ಕವಿ - 1; ಮೋಡ ಕವಿ mōḍa kavi (clouds) to cover the sky; 2. (fig.) a feeling of gloominess or depression to set in; 3. (fig.) (intelligence, wit) to be exhausted (as to make the person to be loss a to what to do).

ಮೋಡಿ ಹಾಕು mōḍi hāku = ಮೋಡಿ ಮಾಡು; ಮೋಡಿ ತೆಗೆ mōḍi tege to remove the evil effects of black magic by counter magic; ಮೋಡಿ ಮಾಡು mōḍi māḍu to use magic for evil purpose; 2. to attract or please greatly; to enchant; to allure; to fascinate; to charm; 3. to make another believe by pretentious manners and cheat.
the vine Piper chaba ( = P. officinarum) of Piperaceae family.
a woman lacking ordinary quickness and keenness of mind; she who is characterised by or proceeding from mental dullness; a stupid woman.
an entertainer who is skilled in producing illusion by sleight of hand, deceptive devices, etc.; a magician.
a man who by his words, manners, styles, etc. enchants others.
